title: Who is Cristiano Ronaldo's real wife?

og.title: Who is Cristiano Ronaldo's real wife?
og.description: Answer (1 of 46): If you go with the Wikipedia definitions of “Marriage” then CR7 is not married yet. During his Manchester United days, he had a one night stand with a hotel waitress(some sources say she is “American”). After few months, she became pregnant and informed CR7. She is Roman Catholi...
